7 Components

To do

7.1 Component

The component Component is the parent class of all components in the UI Kit. It is an abstrac class that it means that it doesn't exist as a CSS class itself but as a mixin that can be inherited in any component.

c-component

@mixinTest covered

Injects the general behavior and properties of the abstract class Component to other components of the UI Kit.

Usage

.test {
        @include c-component;
}

Will product the next result:

.test {
        box-sizing: border-box;
}
Compatibility IE8+, Firefox 29+, Chrome 10+, Edge 12+, Safari 5.1+, Opera 9.5+

7.1 Button

The component Button is officially supported in <a>, <input>, <button> and <span> tags.

.egeo-c-button - Button without type .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1 - Button call-to-action-1 .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1:hover - Button call-to-action-1:hover .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2 - Button call-to-action-2 .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2:hover - Button call-to-action-2:hover .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3 - Button call-to-action-3 .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3:hover - Button call-to-action-3:hover .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4 - Button call-to-action-4 .egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4:hover - Button call-to-action-4:hover .egeo-c-button--danger - Button danger .egeo-c-button--danger:hover - Button danger:hover

egeo-c-button-modifier

@mixinTest covered

Creates a new modifier which is a type of button with the properties passed as parameters.

Usage

.test {
     @include egeo-c-button-modifier('warning',
                                      orange,
                                      1px solid blue,
                                      white,
                                      red,
                                      1px solid white,
                                      white
                                      );
}

Will product the next result:

.test--warning {
        background: orange;
     border: 1px solid blue;
     color: white;
}

.test--warning:hover {
     background: red;
     border: 1px solid white;
     color: white;
}

egeo-c-button

@mixinTest coveredInternal

Internally used to create the Egeo buttons in an extensible way.

How to extend the button

   .#{$egeo-namespace}c-button {
       @include egeo-c-button;

       // your code here

       // If you want to use the modifier constructor
       @include egeo-c-button-modifier('name-of-you-modifier',
                                   #000, // Background value
                                   1px solid #000, // Border value
                                   #000, // Color value
                                   #000, // Background value on hover
                                   1px solid #000, // Border value on hover
                                   #000, // Color value on hover
                                   );
   }

How to create a new button inheriting from button

   .my-button {
       @include egeo-c-button;

       // your code here

       // If you want to use the modifier constructor
       @include egeo-c-button-modifier('name-of-you-modifier',
                                   #000, // Background value
                                   1px solid #000, // Border value
                                   #000, // Color value
                                   #000, // Background value on hover
                                   1px solid #000, // Border value on hover
                                   #000, // Color value on hover
                                   );
   }
Compatibility untested

Variables exposed to theming

Variable Default value
$egeo-c-button true
$egeo-c-button---height 40px
$egeo-c-button---min-width 180px
$egeo-c-button---padding 0 20px
$egeo-c-button---text-align center
$egeo-c-button---text-transform uppercase
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1---background egeo-get-color(c1)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1--hover---background egeo-get-color(c1b)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-1--hover---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2---background egeo-get-color(c2)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2--hover---background egeo-get-color(c2b)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-2--hover---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3---background egeo-get-color(c3)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3--hover---background egeo-get-color(c3b)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-3--hover---color egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4---background egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4---border 2px solid egeo-get-color(g3)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4---color egeo-get-color(g4)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4--hover---background egeo-get-color(g0)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4--hover---border 2px solid egeo-get-color(g4)
$egeo-c-button--call-to-action-4--hover---color egeo-get-color(g5)
